mapper.sql: table_id , sql_type, execute_order, execute_sql, last_create_sql, data_status, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into s_table_design_sql(table_id, execute_order, sql_type, execute_sql, last_create_sql, data_status, create_user, update_user) SELECT #{tableId}, COALESCE(t.max_order, 0) + 1, #{sqlType}, #{executeSql}, #{lastCreateSql}, #{dataStatus}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser} FROM ( SELECT MAX(execute_order) AS max_order FROM s_table_design_sql WHERE table_id = #{tableId} ) AS t
mapper.select: select * from s_table_design_sql where table_id = #{tableId} order by execute_order desc limit 1
